thread.title: Marvin Toma
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Marvin Toma

author: Marvin Toma
title: Marvin Toma
text: Great trip! Vered from Calgary Goway office was very efficient and did a great job with what we wanted to see on this trip. Great hotels, flights, day tours we wanted, and transportation to and from the airports, always on time. The day's tours were great, with pick ups on time and your operators and guides were fantastic. No complaints or problems on our trip of a life time. We will certainly book with Vered and Goway travel again, plus recommend it to all our friends. Thank you Vered and Goway.
